items.metataghtml: <meta name="description" content="Walker Tape®’s Super Stick is famous for its high initial tack.">
items.storedetaileddescription: Super Stick is an extended wear (1-10 days) tape known for its high and strong initial tack. An excellent choice for poly hair systems, Super Stick tape is a strong adhesive with low residue and offers easy removal for wearers. A top pick for those looking a reliable hold and easy removal.
items.outofstockbehavior: Allow back orders with no out-of-stock message
items.featureddescription:
Storage

   

Keep the product away from heat, humidity, and light. Store in a well-ventilated, cool, dark, dry, room-temperature controlled environment (60-80°F). Seal bags completely. With proper storage, our tapes have a shelf life of up to one year.
items.storedescription:
We recommend performing a patch test before use.

 

Prep for Install

  1. Clean the hair system and bio hair with Bond Breaker Shampoo, let dry.
  2. Apply 99% Alcohol to the scalp and the base of the system to prepare for optimal adhesion. Allow to completely evaporate.
  3. Apply Max Hold Sport or Scalp Protector to the scalp to enhance the tape’s bond strength and shield against skin irritation.

 

Applying the Tape

  1. Peel off the white liner that is scored down the middle.
  2. Place the adhesive side toward the unit. Avoid touching the adhesive.
  3. Place the tape contour where desired on the hair system. Repeat as needed.
  4. When ready to apply to the scalp, peel off the remaining printed liner pieces. For easier application, spray Just-Rite Positioning Spray over the adhesive area to allow for more time to place and more precise placements.
  5. Press the hair system firmly onto the scalp, taking care not to move it in the process.
items.pagetitle: Super Stick - AA Contour, 36pc/Bag | Walker Tape
